prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon with a graceful appearance and celestial features.
I want a serene Pokemon that embodies tranquility and has dream-like qualities.
Generate an elegant creature with flowing shapes and a calming color palette.
Make a Pokemon that represents the night sky, featuring soft shades and a unique silhouette.
Imagine a ethereal being with psychic powers, adorned with elegant curves and bright colors.
Design a Pokemon with a soothing presence, perfect for calming the stormy seas.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that has a celestial theme and appears in tranquil settings.
